greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 8^n mod n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b066439.txt", n, " ", 8^n % n) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Feb 14 2010
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 27 2001
